label: Welcome Message
text: Hello! I am a live counselor. This chat line does not take reports of abuse, but we are here to listen and to help by providing information, resources, and emotional support. How can I help you today?

label: Abusive Language
text: Please use respectful language or I will need to end the conversation. Thank you.

label: Adult Support
text: Who is the adult you trust the most? Maybe a teacher, counselor, or relative?

label: Confidential Non Anon
text: Our hotline is confidential but not anonymous. Our counselors can only see information you choose to share and we do not ask for identifying information. However, in emergencies supervisors may need to notify CPS or police.

label: CPS Response
text: I wish I could give you details about what happens when you report, but investigations are handled differently depending on the type of abuse reported and the ways the laws are written in each state. However, the main goal of CPS in every state is to keep children safe.

label: External Links
text: Unfortunately, we cannot click on external links or view attachments like pictures. Can you describe your concern?

label: Immediate Danger 911
text: If you are in immediate danger or in need of medical attention, please call 911.

label: No Contact Warning
text: Checking in— I haven't heard from you and will need to end the conversation if there is no response in the next 5 minutes.

label: Non reporting line
text: Abuse must be reported to Child Protective Services in the state where the abuse occurred. We are not able to receive reports of abuse on our hotline, but I can get you information to report. In what city and state did the abuse occur?

label: Please wait
text: Please give me a moment to research resources. I appreciate your patience.

label: Purpose of Hotline
text: Our crisis line provides emotional support, education, guidance, and resources to individuals affected by child abuse.

label: CSAM Reporting
text: Child Sexual Abuse Material (CSAM) can be reported to the National Center for Missing and Exploited Children's CyberTipline at https://report.cybertip.org/reporting and clicking 'I understand' or by calling 1-800-843-5678. Do not share or forward this content with anyone

label: Multiple Contacts
text: It appears you are connected with another counselor. I will end our conversation so you can focus.

label: Spanish Call Us
text: Para asistencia en español, por favor llame a la línea directa al 1-800-422-4453 para que podamos usar un intérprete para ayudarle

label: Tech Issues
text: We are experiencing technical difficulties. I appreciate your patience.

label: Wrap-up
text: Thank you for contacting our hotline. I will need to assist others at this time. We are here 24/7 if you need further support. Take care.
